name: Punks vs Police
description:
Punks Vs Police is a player vs player local multiplayer brawler set in 1970-80s London with a heavy inspiration of the Punk subculture of the period. The game was created in 6 weeks to be presented at TEDx Leamington Spa 2019, which was held at the Warwickshire College, where attendees got the chance to play students’ games.

(Gamepad only)
